column4: i want to install packages from net , one from ubuntu-software-center and other one is from terminal on the same time .How could i do that ?
i want to install packages from internet
when i try to that i get an error  Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable)
ok ! how to get lock on  /var/lib/dpkg/lock
wao ! thanks for such a wonderfull info .
that info was for other things though. the answer to what you asked is, you CANNOT install two things at the same time.
obviously some people ask. why don't you ask a specific question?
i've no idea what you mean by "train"
there is also a fine channel #supybot
it will install SQLite. you can find that out by doing "apt-cache show supybot", you will see that in the "Depends:" line there is python-sqlite
uh... in what documentation? i've created some bots, like the FloodBots here
ah yes, but that is hardly "creating bots". you can submit new factoids too, but let's take this to #ubuntu-offtopic
it's certainly possible, but it's well beyond the scope of #ubuntu
: i want to start a application or script after 15 minuter from startup .How can i do this
cron can run stuff at reboot. but i don't think it can run it n minutes *after* reboot. so you would need to combine cron with a timer script.
